edu.xtec.jclic.clic3

Class TripleColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.xtec.jclic.clic3.TripleColor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class TripleColor
extends Object
implements Cloneable
    This class is just a data structure with three Color objects, defining the background, foreground and shadow colors used to draw cells, and a boolean that indicates if a shadow should be painted under texts.
    Version:
    13.08.28
    Author:
    Francesc Busquets (fbusquets@xtec.cat)
